comments_since_last_sample.body:
I too have the Witcher 3 (since day one) haven’t played it yet. Think it’s time. 

Short story why - when it came out I immediately had to start working 13 days 1 off schedules on a night shift for 2 years. All my free time went to the wife so I just didn’t play games. Then once that schedule ended I had so many other games to play that a game that’s 100+ hrs sounded too long for what little free time I have.
I'd go with the shorter ones first. Doom Eternal, then GoW2018.
Put them on a roulette. They are all great games. Big fan of music and pace in doom. Enjoy the relaxing witcher
doom eternal the shooting and moving is so good

top_comments_top.body: doom eternal the shooting and moving is so good
